import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,BarElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';import{fetchCommunications}from'../../utils/api';// Register Chart.js components
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,BarElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);const EffectivenessReport=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetchCommunications();setData(response);}catch(error){setError(error.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[]);const chartData={labels:data.map(item=>item.method),datasets:[{label:'Effectiveness',data:data.map(item=>item.successRate),backgroundColor:'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.6)',borderColor:'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)',borderWidth:1}]};const options={responsive:true,plugins:{legend:{display:true,position:'top'},title:{display:true,text:'Effectiveness of Communication Methods'}},scales:{y:{beginAtZero:true,title:{display:true,text:'Success Rate (%)'}}}};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Error: ",error]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"effectiveness-report",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Communication Effectiveness Report"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:chartData,options:options})]});};export default EffectivenessReport;
